# Welcome to Project Setup Guidance

This site provides comprehensive materials for setting up data science projects, tailored for both course delivery and general use. Whether you're working with **Python** or **R**, you'll find step-by-step instructions and best practices to help you start your project efficiently.

## What You'll Find Here

- Guidance for setting up Python projects
- Guidance for setting up R projects
- General advice for organizing data science projects
- Resources and templates for reproducible workflows

Explore the sections to get started with your preferred language and learn how to structure your projects for success!
